tr_quotes.quote: Her çile cennet yolunun bir taşıdır
tr_quotes.author: Hz. Muhammed

tr_quotes.quote: Her insanın kıymeti, ahlakının güzelliği kadardır
tr_quotes.author: Hz. Ali

tr_quotes.quote: Sabırlı ol. Avni gözyaşlarınla imtihan eden, elbet bir gün gülümseterek verecektir mükafatını
tr_quotes.author: Nebi Yıldız

tr_quotes.quote: Her şey neye layıksa ona dönüşür
tr_quotes.author: Mevlana

tr_quotes.quote: Dinim çok basit. Dinim iyiliktir.
tr_quotes.author: Dalai Lama

tr_quotes.quote: Herkesin içinde tuttuğu bir duası vardır. Allah o saklı duanızı kabul etsin.
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: Umut dolu bir bahçeden, hüzünle döndürme beni Allah'ım.
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: Kalbi yaratan Allah, kalbin içinden geçenleri bilmez mi...
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: Umut var mı? Dua varsa umut var. Zira Allah varsa her şey var...
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: İbadetin en kıymetlisi, nefse uymaktır.
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: Duyduğu her şeyi söylemesi, kişiye günah olarak yeter.
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: Söylenen söz kalmaz muallakta, ya sağa yazılır ya sola...
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: İslamiyet, sevgi, güler yüz, tatlı söz, dürüstlük ve iyilik dinidir.
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: Allah’ım ben her halimi sana bıraktım. Sen beni kullarının eline bırakma.
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: Neden ümitsizliğe düşeyim… Her daim umutları yaratan rabbim varken.
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: Ne güzel dua; “Allah’ım bana seni unutturmayacak mutluluk ver.”
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: Başkalarının lafları seni üzmesin; çünkü güç ve kuvvet sadece Allah’ındır.
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: Ya Rabbi! İmtihanımızı imanımızdan, büyük eyleme…
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: İnsanlar iki gruba ayrılırlar; günahkâr olduklarını düşünen hak ehli insanlar ve hak ehli olduklarını düşünen günahkârlar.
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: Yeni ilaç bulduk, diyor tabipler, lokman gibi, devâ bilse, ne fayda. Son nefeste söylemezse, bu diller, bülbül gibi dilin olsa, ne fayda?
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: Bana yakın olanlar soyumdan gelenler değil, yolumdan gelenlerdir.
tr_quotes.author: Hz. Muhammet (SAV)

tr_quotes.quote: Mümin güneş gibidir. Sararıp, solarak batar ama doğduğunda (ahirette) göz kamaştırır.
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: Görmeden sevilir mi seviliyor işte, salat ve selam sana ya Resulallah…
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: Sabır acıdır ama meyvesi tatlıdır!..Nefsinin arzularına tâbi olan, Allahü teâlânın nasıl kul olur? Ey insan! Kime tâbi isen onun kulu olursun.
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: Ya rabbi, yüreği yanmış, gözyaşları içine akmış, ümitleri zorda olan tüm insanlara ümit, sabır ve ferahlık ver.
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: Yıllardır kendimi, güyâ tanırdım;sanık ben, yargıç ben, hep aklanırdım. Şeytanı, en büyük düşman sanırdım; ondan da beteri.. Nefsimmiş meğer
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: Yaşlanarak değil yaşayarak tecrübe kazanılır, zaman insanları değil armutları olgunlaştırır
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: Olgun kimse affetmeyi borç, iyilik etmeyi farz olarak kabul eder...
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: Geceleyin secde ederek ve ayakta durarak boyun büken, ahretten çekinen ve Rab binin rahmetinden dileyen kimse inkar eden kimse gibi olur mu.
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: Sanma ki tesettür sadece kadına farzdır. Erkeğin tesettürü göz kapaklarındadır.
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: Olmuyorsa olmuyordur vardır Allah’ın bir bildiği, isyan etme sakın sonra anlarsın senin için yapılan iyiliği…
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: Geçmişim için estağfurullah, bugünüm için elhamdülillah, yarınım için inşallah…
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: Cehennem, uzaktan gösterilince, ateşin, mahşer yerine sürünce, sırat köprüsüne, halk yürüyünce, aslan gibi gücün olsa, ne fayda?
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: Her gecenin bir gündüzü vardır.
tr_quotes.author: Hz. Ali

tr_quotes.quote: Bin zulme uğrasan da, bir zulüm yapma.
tr_quotes.author: Hz. Ali

tr_quotes.quote: Söylenen söz kalmaz muallakta, ya sağa yazılır ya sola.
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: Güzel söz söyleyen, kimseden kötü söz işitmez.
tr_quotes.author: Firdevsi

tr_quotes.quote: Fakire Allah versin diyen zengin, peki sana kim veriyor?
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: Nefis üç köşeli dikendir, ne türlü koysan batar.
tr_quotes.author: Mevlana

tr_quotes.quote: Ya olduğun gibi görün, ya da göründüğün gibi ol.
tr_quotes.author: Mevlana

tr_quotes.quote: Hiç kimse, diğer bir kimsenin kulu değildir.
tr_quotes.author: Hz. Ali

tr_quotes.quote: Kainatta en yüksek hakikat imandır, imandan sonra namazdır.
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: Güzel ahlak; bağışlayıcılık, sabır ve tahammüldür.
tr_quotes.author: Hasan-ı Basri

tr_quotes.quote: Cevizi kırıp özüne inemeyen, hepsini kabuk zanneder.
tr_quotes.author: İmam Gazali

tr_quotes.quote: Güzel konuşmanın sırrı, lüzumsuz sözleri terk etmektir.
tr_quotes.author: Hz. Ebubekir

tr_quotes.quote: Birliğin kederi, ayrılığın safasından daha hayırlıdır.
tr_quotes.author: Yahya bin Muaz

tr_quotes.quote: Bilmediklerimi ayağımın altına alsaydım başım göğe ererdi.
tr_quotes.author: İmam-ı Azam

tr_quotes.quote: Eğer muhabbetin sonunu Allah’a bağlayamadıysak boş konuşmuşuz demektir…
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: Hiçbir acı, cehaletten daha fazla zahmet verici değildir.
tr_quotes.author: Hz. Ali

tr_quotes.quote: Uzun mesafelere ulaşmak, yakın mesafeleri aşmakla mümkündür.
tr_quotes.author: İmam Gazali

tr_quotes.quote: Hayatında ekmeği yenmeyen kimsenin adı, ölümünden sonra anılmaz.
tr_quotes.author: Şeyh Sadi

tr_quotes.quote: Cahillerin kalbi dudaklarında, alimlerin dudakları kalplerindedir.
tr_quotes.author: Hz. Ali

tr_quotes.quote: Kibir, bele bağlanmış taş gibidir. Onunla ne yüzülür ne de uçulur.
tr_quotes.author: Hacı Bayram-ı Veli

tr_quotes.quote: Ebedi olan cennet, dünyadaki bir kaç günlük amelin değil halis niyetlerin karşılığıdır.
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: Baharların tesiriyle taş yeşerir mi? Toprak ol ki renk renk çiçekler bitiresin.
tr_quotes.author: Mevlana

tr_quotes.quote: Haksızlık karşısında eğilmeyiniz; çünkü hakkınızla beraber şerefinizi de kaybedersiniz.
tr_quotes.author: Hz. Ali

tr_quotes.quote: İslamiyet güneş gibidir üflemekle sönmez, gündüz gibidir göz yummakla gece olmaz. Gözünü kapayan yalnız kendine gece yapar.
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: Rabbim öyle bir insan koy ki kalbime ama o insan seninde sevdiğin olsun bana öyle bir gözler göster ki o gözlerden sana bakayım .
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: Eğer bir gün dünyaya ait çok büyük bir derdin olursa; Rabbine dönüp: “Benim büyük bir derdim var” deme. Derdine dönüp: “Benim çok büyük bir rabbim var” de.
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: Dostlukta da düşmanlıkta da aşırıya kaçmayın.
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: Düşmanların en büyüğü düşmanlığını gizleyendir.
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: İnsanların en hayırlısı, ahlakı en güzel olanıdır.
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: Vücudun rahatı az yemekte; ruhun rahatı az günahtadır.
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: İman iki eşit parçadır. Yarısı sabır, yarısı şükürdür.
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: Bir baba, çocuğuna güzel terbiyeden daha iyi miras bırakamaz.
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: Zengin, çok mala sahip olana denmez, zengin kalbi olana denir.
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: Sakın kendisine verdiğin kıymeti sana vermeyenle arkadaş olma.
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: Temiz ve helâl ye de, ister sabaha kadar ibadet et, ister uyu!
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: Sonradan özür dilemeyi gerektiren şeyleri yapmaktan kaçınınız.
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: Siz kendiniz namuslu olun ki, kadınlarınız da namuslu olsunlar.
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: İslâm, ancak kendi orijinal kavramlarıyla anlaşılır ve anlatılır.
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: En büyük düşmanın, iki kaburga kemiğinin arasında olan düşmandır.
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: Bir insanın gerçek zenginliği, onun bu dünyada yaptığı iyiliklerdir.
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: Namaz kılmak, yalnız Allah-ü Teâlâ’dan korkan müminlere, kolay gelir.
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: Mazlumun bedduasından sakınınız. O dua ile Allah arasında perde yoktur.
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: Gözü harama bakmaktan ve başkalarının ayıplarını görmekten korumalıdır!
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: Sen var gününde Allah dersin de Allah senin dar gününde kulum demez mi?
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: Akrabanın düşmanlığı ve dostların eziyeti, yılan zefirinden daha acıdır.
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: Daima kendi menfaatini göz önünde bulunduran kimse, pek çabuk düşman kazanır.
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: İşlediğiniz günahları gizlediğiniz gibi, yaptığınız iyilikleri de gizleyiniz!
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: Kötülüğün giremediği tek yer alın ile secde arasıdır
tr_quotes.author: Muhyiddin Şekûr

tr_quotes.quote: Rabbine ne kadar muhtaç isen ona o kadar ibadet et
tr_quotes.author: Lokman Hekim

tr_quotes.quote: En zor ibadet gönül kazanmaktır.
tr_quotes.author: Hz. Ömer

tr_quotes.quote: İbadet bir kuş olsaydı, hiç şüphesiz kanatları oruç ve namaz olurdu
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: En üstün ibadet, sıkıntı anında sabırla kurtulmayı beklemektir.
tr_quotes.author: Hz. Muhammed

tr_quotes.quote: En büyük günahi kalp kırmaktır
tr_quotes.author: Hz. Ömer

tr_quotes.quote: Gerçekten yüksek bir zat, ibadet ettikçe tevazusu artar
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

en_quotes.quote: When I admire the wonders of a sunset or the beauty of the moon, my soul expands in the worship of the creator
en_quotes.author: Mahatma Gandhi

en_quotes.quote: You cannot believe in God until you believe in yourself
en_quotes.author: Swami Vivekananda

en_quotes.quote: Religion and art spring from the same root and are close kin. Economics and art are strangers
en_quotes.author: Nathaniel Hawthorne

en_quotes.quote: Gentleness, self-sacrifice and generosity are the exclusive possession of no one race or religion
en_quotes.author: Mahatma Gandhi

en_quotes.quote: Prayer is the key of the morning and the bolt of the evening
en_quotes.author: Mahatma Gandhi

en_quotes.quote: There should be no discrimination against languages people speak, skin color, or religion
en_quotes.author: Malala Yousafzai

en_quotes.quote: Worship is a way of seeing the world in the light of God
en_quotes.author: Abraham Joshua Heschel

en_quotes.quote: It's wonderful to climb the liquid mountains of the sky. Behind me and before me is God and I have no fears
en_quotes.author: Helen Keller

en_quotes.quote: So I say to you, Ask and it will be given to you; search, and you will find; knock, and the door will be opened for you
en_quotes.author: Jesus Christ

en_quotes.quote: Within the covers of the Bible are the answers for all the problems men face
en_quotes.author: Ronald Reagan

en_quotes.quote: We have to pray with our eyes on God, not on the difficulties
en_quotes.author: Oswald Chambers

en_quotes.quote: To be a Christian without prayer is no more possible than to be alive without breathing
en_quotes.author: Martin Luther

en_quotes.quote: Beauty has no boundaries, no rules, no colors. Beauty is like a religion. You can include everything inside it
en_quotes.author: Alessandro Michele

en_quotes.quote: Religion is the impotence of the human mind to deal with occurrences it cannot understand
en_quotes.author: Karl Marx

en_quotes.quote: I believe in the religion of Islam. I believe in Allah and peace
en_quotes.author: Muhammad Ali

en_quotes.quote: The more powerful and original a mind, the more it will incline towards the religion of solitude
en_quotes.author: Aldous Huxley

en_quotes.quote: To gather with God's people in united adoration of the Father is as necessary to the Christian life as prayer
en_quotes.author: Martin Luther

en_quotes.quote: It is only when men begin to worship that they begin to grow
en_quotes.author: Calvin Coolidge

en_quotes.quote: I like the religion that teaches liberty, equality and fraternity
en_quotes.author: B. R. Ambedkar

en_quotes.quote: Religion is the recognition of all our duties as divine commands
en_quotes.author: Immanuel Kant

en_quotes.quote: God is to be worshipped as the one beloved, dearer than everything in this and next life
en_quotes.author: Swami Vivekananda

en_quotes.quote: The World is my country, all mankind are my brethren, and to do good is my religion
en_quotes.author: Thomas Paine

en_quotes.quote: Heaven is under our feet as well as over our heads
en_quotes.author: Henry David Thoreau

en_quotes.quote: Those who say religion has nothing to do with politics do not know what religion is
en_quotes.author: Mahatma Gandhi

en_quotes.quote: If I had to choose a religion, the sun as the universal giver of life would be my god
en_quotes.author: Napoleon Bonaparte

en_quotes.quote: When I do good I feel good, when I do bad I feel bad, and that's my religion
en_quotes.author: Abraham Lincoln

en_quotes.quote: A thorough knowledge of the Bible is worth more than a college education
en_quotes.author: Theodore Roosevelt

en_quotes.quote: Religion is the masterpiece of the art of animal training, for it trains people as to how they shall think
en_quotes.author: Arthur Schopenhauer

en_quotes.quote: The first requisite for the happiness of the people is the abolition of religion
en_quotes.author: Karl Marx

en_quotes.quote: Most men's anger about religion is as if two men should quarrel for a lady they neither of them care for
en_quotes.author: Edward Wood, 1st Earl of Halifax

en_quotes.quote: Fashion is almost like a religion, for me at least
en_quotes.author: ASAP Rocky

en_quotes.quote: God is a metaphor for that which transcends all levels of intellectual thought. It's as simple as that
en_quotes.author: Joseph Campbell

en_quotes.quote: When it is a question of money, everybody is of the same religion
en_quotes.author: Voltaire

en_quotes.quote: I count religion but a childish toy, and hold there is no sin but ignorance
en_quotes.author: Christopher Marlowe

en_quotes.quote: As with the Christian religion, the worst advertisement for Socialism is its adherents
en_quotes.author: George Orwell

en_quotes.quote: Religion is what keeps the poor from murdering the rich
en_quotes.author: Napoleon Bonaparte

en_quotes.quote: A religion that takes no account of practical affairs and does not help to solve them is no religion
en_quotes.author: Mahatma Gandhi

en_quotes.quote: We know too much, and are convinced of too little. Our literature is a substitute for religion, and so is our religion
en_quotes.author: T. S. Eliot

en_quotes.quote: We are always on the anvil; by trials God is shaping us for higher things
en_quotes.author: Henry Ward Beecher

en_quotes.quote: We have enough religion to make us hate, but not enough to make us love one another
en_quotes.author: Jonathan Swift

en_quotes.quote: God does not discriminate against people, regardless of color, religion, social class, or gender and sexual preferences
en_quotes.author: Rodrigo Duterte

en_quotes.quote: Prayer does not change God, but it changes him who prays
en_quotes.author: Soren Kierkegaard

en_quotes.quote: Jesus is ideal and wonderful, but you Christians - you are not like him
en_quotes.author: Mahatma Gandhi

en_quotes.quote: The Bible shows the way to go to heaven, not the way the heavens go
en_quotes.author: Galileo Galilei

en_quotes.quote: No religion has mandated killing others as a requirement for its sustenance or promotion
en_quotes.author: A. P. J. Abdul Kalam

en_quotes.quote: Religion is regarded by the common people as true, by the wise as false, and by the rulers as useful
en_quotes.author: Lucius Annaeus Seneca

en_quotes.quote: I have an everyday religion that works for me. Love yourself first, and everything else falls into line
en_quotes.author: Lucille Ball

en_quotes.quote: We can live without religion and meditation, but we cannot survive without human affection
en_quotes.author: Dalai Lama

en_quotes.quote: Religion without humanity is very poor human stuff
en_quotes.author: Sojourner Truth

en_quotes.quote: One act of obedience is better than one hundred sermons
en_quotes.author: Dietrich Bonhoeffer

en_quotes.quote: Freedom prospers when religion is vibrant and the rule of law under God is acknowledged
en_quotes.author: Ronald Reagan

en_quotes.quote: All religions must be tolerated... for every man must get to heaven in his own way
en_quotes.author: Epictetus

en_quotes.quote: If, then, you are looking for the way by which you should go, take Christ, because He Himself is the way
en_quotes.author: Thomas Aquinas

en_quotes.quote: If faith is lost, there is no security and there is no life for him who does not adhere to religion
en_quotes.author: Muhammad Iqbal

en_quotes.quote: The truths of religion are never so well understood as by those who have lost the power of reason
en_quotes.author: Voltaire

en_quotes.quote: Religion is the opium of the masses
en_quotes.author: Karl Marx

en_quotes.quote: It is in our lives and not our words that our religion must be read
en_quotes.author: Thomas Jefferson

en_quotes.quote: The more I study religions the more I am convinced that man never worshipped anything but himself
en_quotes.author: Richard Burton

en_quotes.quote: Religion. A daughter of Hope and Fear, explaining to Ignorance the nature of the Unknowable
en_quotes.author: Ambrose Bierce

en_quotes.quote: I never knew how to worship until I knew how to love
en_quotes.author: Henry Ward Beecher

en_quotes.quote: The first time I sang in the church choir; two hundred people changed their religion
en_quotes.author: Fred Allen

en_quotes.quote: The visionary imagination is the source of art and religion
en_quotes.author: Alex Grey

en_quotes.quote: When I have a terrible need of - shall I say the word - religion. Then I go out and paint the stars
en_quotes.author: Vincent Van Gogh

en_quotes.quote: For the record, I don't worship the devil. I just hate religion
en_quotes.author: Tyler, The Creator

en_quotes.quote: There is only one religion, though there are a hundred versions of it
en_quotes.author: George Bernard Shaw

en_quotes.quote: Fascism is a religion. The twentieth century will be known in history as the century of Fascism
en_quotes.author: Benito Mussolini

en_quotes.quote: Whoever seeks to set one religion against another seeks to destroy all religion
en_quotes.author: Franklin D. Roosevelt

en_quotes.quote: I don't go by my caste, creed or religion. My works speak for me
en_quotes.author: Shashi Tharoor

en_quotes.quote: There is not enough religion in the world even to destroy religion
en_quotes.author: Friedrich Nietzsche

en_quotes.quote: The God who existed before any religion counts on you to make the oneness of the human family known and celebrated
en_quotes.author: Desmond Tutu

en_quotes.quote: I prayed for twenty years but received no answer until I prayed with my legs
en_quotes.author: Frederick Douglass

en_quotes.quote: Religion and slavery are incompatible
en_quotes.author: B. R. Ambedkar

en_quotes.quote: I have this deep and abiding faith in God. But this does not mean that you have to have a religion or follow somebody
en_quotes.author: Rodrigo Duterte

en_quotes.quote: There are many of us that are willing to do great things for the Lord, but few of us are willing to do little things
en_quotes.author: Dwight L. Moody

en_quotes.quote: The glory of Christianity is to conquer by forgiveness
en_quotes.author: William Blake

en_quotes.quote: Religion is just mind control
en_quotes.author: George Carlin

en_quotes.quote: Religion is dangerous because it allows human beings who don't have all the answers to think that they do
en_quotes.author: Bill Maher

en_quotes.quote: Conversion is not my intention. Changing religion is not easy. You may develop some kind of confusion or difficulties
en_quotes.author: Dalai Lama

en_quotes.quote: Religion is the search for ultimate meaning
en_quotes.author: Viktor E. Frankl

en_quotes.quote: The difference between a saint and a hypocrite is that one lies for his religion, the other by it
en_quotes.author: Minna Antrim

en_quotes.quote: Many good sayings are to be found in holy books, but merely reading them will not make one religious
en_quotes.author: Ramakrishna

en_quotes.quote: Difference of opinion is advantageous in religion. The several sects perform the office of a Censor - over each other
en_quotes.author: Thomas Jefferson

en_quotes.quote: The Christian religion, though scattered and abroad will in the end gather itself together at the foot of the cross
en_quotes.author: Johann Wolfgang von Goethe

en_quotes.quote: Superstition is the religion of feeble minds
en_quotes.author: Edmund Burke

en_quotes.quote: If there is a God, atheism must seem to Him as less of an insult than religion
en_quotes.author: Edmond de Goncourt

en_quotes.quote: After it is all over, the religion of man is his most important possession
en_quotes.author: John D. Rockefeller

en_quotes.quote: You can have religion with spirituality. You can also have religion without spirituality
en_quotes.author: Eckhart Tolle

en_quotes.quote: I believe in the separation of church and state, but I do not believe in the separation of politics from religion
en_quotes.author: Rick Warren

en_quotes.quote: We can only learn to know ourselves and do what we can - namely, surrender our will and fulfill God's will in us
en_quotes.author: Saint Teresa of Avila

en_quotes.quote: Any system of religion that has anything in it that shocks the mind of a child, cannot be true
en_quotes.author: Thomas Paine

en_quotes.quote: Fear of things invisible in the natural seed of that which everyone in himself calleth religion
en_quotes.author: Thomas Hobbes

en_quotes.quote: Freedom of religion is a fundamental Constitutional principle. It's a founding principle of this country
en_quotes.author: Paul Ryan

en_quotes.quote: The greatest tragedy in mankind's entire history may be the hijacking of morality by religion
en_quotes.author: Arthur C. Clarke

en_quotes.quote: It is a debt we owe to the purity of our religion to show that it is at variance with that law which warrants slavery
en_quotes.author: Patrick Henry

en_quotes.quote: My whole life has been movies and religion. That's it. Nothing else
en_quotes.author: Martin Scorsese

en_quotes.quote: Let your religion be less of a theory and more of a love affair
en_quotes.author: Gilbert K. Chesterton

en_quotes.quote: Worship means reverence and humility it means revering your real self and humbling delusions
en_quotes.author: Bodhidharma

en_quotes.quote: One person's religion is another person's cult
en_quotes.author: Philip Seymour Hoffman

en_quotes.quote: Religion will prove to the believer a comforter and a sure guide to the fountain of true happiness
en_quotes.author: Ellen G. White

en_quotes.quote: Doubt is part of all religion. All the religious thinkers were doubters
en_quotes.author: Isaac Bashevis Singer

en_quotes.quote: Religion is a temper, not a pursuit
en_quotes.author: Harriet Martineau

en_quotes.quote: Unfortunately, religion, like patriotism, is easy to misuse for political purposes
en_quotes.author: Kjell Magne Bondevik

en_quotes.quote: I am fascinated in religion and theology and what people believe
en_quotes.author: Sarah Wayne Callies

en_quotes.quote: A little philosophy inclineth man's mind to atheism, but depth in philosophy bringeth men's minds about to religion
en_quotes.author: Francis Bacon

en_quotes.quote: Joy in the universe, and keen curiosity about it all - that has been my religion
en_quotes.author: John Burroughs

en_quotes.quote: I know the Bible is inspired because it inspires me
en_quotes.author: Dwight L. Moody

en_quotes.quote: Only a god can save us
en_quotes.author: Martin Heidegger

en_quotes.quote: Forget sex or politics or religion, loneliness is the subject that clears out a room
en_quotes.author: Douglas Coupland

en_quotes.quote: I don't know whether I want to improve religion or not. I prefer to get rid of it
en_quotes.author: B. F. Skinner

en_quotes.quote: Religion flourishes in greater purity, without than with the aid of Government
en_quotes.author: James Madison

en_quotes.quote: Even if a unity of faith is not possible, a unity of love is
en_quotes.author: Hans Urs von Balthasar

en_quotes.quote: Religion and culture are two important ways in which we as humans find our identity. That's certainly true for me
en_quotes.author: Gene Luen Yang

en_quotes.quote: We are a religious people whose institutions presuppose a Supreme Being
en_quotes.author: William O. Douglas

en_quotes.quote: The Bible is worth all the other books which have ever been printed
en_quotes.author: Patrick Henry

en_quotes.quote: No man ever believes that the Bible means what it says: He is always convinced that it says what he means
en_quotes.author: George Bernard Shaw

en_quotes.quote: True religion is real living; living with all one's soul, with all one's goodness and righteousness
en_quotes.author: Albert Einstein

en_quotes.quote: It was the experience of mystery - even if mixed with fear - that engendered religion
en_quotes.author: Albert Einstein

en_quotes.quote: Religion is excellent stuff for keeping common people quiet
en_quotes.author: Napoleon Bonaparte

en_quotes.quote: Morality is of the highest importance - but for us, not for God
en_quotes.author: Albert Einstein

en_quotes.quote: I am a deeply religious nonbeliever - this is a somewhat new kind of religion
en_quotes.author: Albert Einstein

en_quotes.quote: Aim at heaven and you will get earth thrown in. Aim at earth and you get neither
en_quotes.author: C. S. Lewis

en_quotes.quote: I care not much for a man's religion whose dog and cat are not the better for it
en_quotes.author: Abraham Lincoln

en_quotes.quote: Let us put theology out of religion. Theology has always sent the worst to heaven, the best to hell
en_quotes.author: Robert Green Ingersoll

en_quotes.quote: The world is divided into men who have wit and no religion and men who have religion and no wit
en_quotes.author: Avicenna

en_quotes.quote: There is no surer sign of decay in a country than to see the rites of religion held in contempt
en_quotes.author: Niccolo Machiavelli

en_quotes.quote: Religion is a matter of the heart. No physical inconvenience can warrant abandonment of one's own religion
en_quotes.author: Mahatma Gandhi

en_quotes.quote: Preach the Gospel at all times and when necessary use words
en_quotes.author: Unknown

en_quotes.quote: God is a thought who makes crooked all that is straight
en_quotes.author: Friedrich Nietzsche

en_quotes.quote: In Christianity neither morality nor religion come into contact with reality at any point
en_quotes.author: Friedrich Nietzsche

en_quotes.quote: My religion teaches me that whenever there is distress which one cannot remove, one must fast and pray
en_quotes.author: Mahatma Gandhi

en_quotes.quote: One's own religion is after all a matter between oneself and one's Maker and no one else's
en_quotes.author: Mahatma Gandhi

en_quotes.quote: You must learn to exist with no religion, no country, no allies. You must learn to live alone in silence
en_quotes.author: William S. Burroughs

en_quotes.quote: Wonder is the basis of worship
en_quotes.author: Thomas Carlyle

en_quotes.quote: Where it is a duty to worship the sun it is pretty sure to be a crime to examine the laws of heat
en_quotes.author: John Morley

en_quotes.quote: Unless we place our religion and our treasure in the same thing, religion will always be sacrificed
en_quotes.author: Epictetus

en_quotes.quote: Generally speaking, the errors in religion are dangerous; those in philosophy only ridiculous
en_quotes.author: David Hume

en_quotes.quote: Communism, like any other revealed religion, is largely made up of prophecies
en_quotes.author: H. L. Mencken

en_quotes.quote: Of all the tyrannies that affect mankind, tyranny in religion is the worst
en_quotes.author: Thomas Paine

en_quotes.quote: God's love is too great to be confined to any one side of a conflict or to any one religion
en_quotes.author: Desmond Tutu

en_quotes.quote: My country is the world, and my religion is to do good
en_quotes.author: Thomas Paine

en_quotes.quote: I think people often come to the synagogue, mosque, the church looking for God, and what we give them is religion
en_quotes.author: Gene Robinson

en_quotes.quote: Religion is all bunk
en_quotes.author: Thomas A. Edison

en_quotes.quote: The framers of our Constitution meant we were to have freedom of religion, not freedom from religion
en_quotes.author: Billy Graham

en_quotes.quote: My religion would be a gentle faith that believed in the sacredness of leisure. Napping as a form of prayer
en_quotes.author: Garrison Keillor

en_quotes.quote: The true meaning of religion is thus, not simply morality, but morality touched by emotion
en_quotes.author: Matthew Arnold

en_quotes.quote: I'm going to tell you what my religion is. Do unto others as you would have them do unto you. Period. Terminato. Finito
en_quotes.author: Gene Wilder

en_quotes.quote: Religion doesn't make people bigots. People are bigots and they use religion to justify their ideology
en_quotes.author: Reza Aslan

en_quotes.quote: All humanity is passion; without passion, religion, history, novels, art would be ineffectual
en_quotes.author: Honore de Balzac

en_quotes.quote: We are punished by our sins, not for them
en_quotes.author: Elbert Hubbard

en_quotes.quote: Kidnapping is always a threat in this life of reporting on men hurting one another because of religion and politics
en_quotes.author: Richard Engel

en_quotes.quote: Where knowledge ends, religion begins
en_quotes.author: Benjamin Disraeli

en_quotes.quote: Like religion, politics, and family planning, cereal is not a topic to be brought up in public. It's too controversial
en_quotes.author: Erma Bombeck

en_quotes.quote: Teach us to give and not to count the cost
en_quotes.author: Saint Ignatius

en_quotes.quote: If fishing is a religion, fly fishing is high church
en_quotes.author: Tom Brokaw

en_quotes.quote: Women have been the most persecuted people throughout all of recorded history, more than any race or religion
en_quotes.author: Leonardo DiCaprio

en_quotes.quote: God made everything out of nothing, but the nothingness shows through
en_quotes.author: Paul Valery

en_quotes.quote: The moral systems of religion, I think, are super important
en_quotes.author: Bill Gates

en_quotes.quote: Love is my religion - I could die for it
en_quotes.author: John Keats

en_quotes.quote: Human beings must be known to be loved; but Divine beings must be loved to be known
en_quotes.author: Blaise Pascal

en_quotes.quote: People can be only divided into good or bad; their race, religion, nationality don't matter
en_quotes.author: Irena Sendler

en_quotes.quote: Socialism is the religion people get when they lose their religion
en_quotes.author: Richard John Neuhaus

en_quotes.quote: If you have a particular faith or religion, that is good. But you can survive without it
en_quotes.author: Dalai Lama

en_quotes.quote: Religion is the frozen thought of man out of which they build temples
en_quotes.author: Jiddu Krishnamurti

en_quotes.quote: Communism has decided against God, against Christ, against the Bible, and against all religion
en_quotes.author: Billy Graham

en_quotes.quote: I do not know how to teach philosophy without becoming a disturber of established religion
en_quotes.author: Baruch Spinoza

en_quotes.quote: You know, religion itself, Eastern and Western, is divisive and quarrelsome anyway
en_quotes.author: Deepak Chopra

en_quotes.quote: To know a person's religion we need not listen to his profession of faith but must find his brand of intolerance
en_quotes.author: Eric Hoffer

en_quotes.quote: Music is my religion
en_quotes.author: Jimi Hendrix

en_quotes.quote: The three great elements of modern civilization, Gun powder, Printing, and the Protestant religion
en_quotes.author: Thomas Carlyle

en_quotes.quote: There is one thing higher than Royalty: and that is religion, which causes us to leave the world, and seek God
en_quotes.author: Elizabeth I

en_quotes.quote: I am an Anglo-Catholic in religion, a classicist in literature and a royalist in politics
en_quotes.author: T. S. Eliot

en_quotes.quote: Educate men without religion and you make of them but clever devils
en_quotes.author: Duke of Wellington

en_quotes.quote: I honor religion except when it gets into shedding blood
en_quotes.author: Rip Torn

en_quotes.quote: Prayer is aligning ourselves with the purposes of God
en_quotes.author: E. Stanley Jones

en_quotes.quote: That which we call the Hindu religion is really the Eternal religion because it embraces all others
en_quotes.author: Sri Aurobindo
